value.description: Default value
Logical delete - can be recovered
Will be removed from the system at some stage
Asset account
Liability account
Revenue account
Expense account
Payment requires client confirmation
Payment confirmed by client waiting for acceptance
Instruction accpted, payment queued for processing
Payment was cancelled
Payment added to a customer account
Payment deducted from a customer account
Default value
Payment made on dehalf of a third party
Payment queued for processing
Payment was cancelled
Payment completed
Payment requires further compliance review
Payment failed compliance review
Payment blocked due to lack of customer funds
Payment queued for processing
Payment submitted to bank
Payment failed processing
Payment completed and reconciled against a bank transaction
Transaction not reconciled, funds in suspense
Transaction reconciled against customer account
Further data needed to review this resource
Resource in compliance review process
Resource reviewed and approved
Resource reviewed and declined
No review process required for this resource
Previously ACCEPTED resource that requires re-review due to elapsed time since last review
Previously ACCEPTED resource that requires re-review due to elapsed time since last review
Resource that is no longer under review
No review process required for this resource
Account for personal use of a named individual only
Account for use of a limited liability legal entity
Account for use of a registered charity
For the distribution of IB only
Relationship not yet defined. Only expected if review status is 'DATA_REQUIRED'
Individual is the beneficial owner of a PERSONAL account
Individual is a director of a CORPORATE account
Individual is an employee of a CORPORATE account
Individual is an advisor to the account

enum.name: charge.code
enum.description: Indicates what charges are accepted. See Swift MT103 71A for further details.

value.description: Shared - each side pays own fees
OUR - payee pays all fees
BEN - benficiary pays all fees
Same day settlement
Next good business day settlement
Second good business day settlement
Live price. The server will accept executions on this quote.
Indicative price. The server will reject executions on this quote as no live price is currently available.
Indicative price. The server will reject executions on this quote as it is outside of market hours.
Indicative price. The server will reject executions on this quote as market is currently suspended.
Indicative price. The server will reject executions on this quote as it doesn't provide prices in thsi curency pair.
